revisions.rev:
A LoCo (Local Community) Team is a group of local [[Linux]] advocates. The main focus of a LoCo team is to advocate the use of the [[Linux]] [[operating system]] as well as the use of [[open source]]/[[free software]] products. ==Ubuntu & LoCos== The [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] OS receives the credit for the promotion of the use of LoCos. They provide an assortment of materials and media to help each LoCo with their goals. ==Approved LoCo Teams== [http://ubuntu.org.ar/ Argentina]
